description: A secret laboratory room within Punk Hazard where SAD (a key ingredient for manufacturing artificial Devil Fruits) is produced. This room becomes the battleground for Law and Vergo's confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Law vs Vergo Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: Vergo brutally tortures Law in this room by squeezing his heart and delivering Haki-enhanced attacks.
keyEvents.significance: The SAD Production Room is revealed as a critical location for Caesar's operations and the site of a crucial battle.

keyEvents.title: Smoker Arrives
keyEvents.description: Smoker arrives to confront Vergo after witnessing Law's torture.
keyEvents.significance: The room becomes the arena for the Vice-Admiral confrontation.

name.japanese: パンクハザードごみ処理室

description: The garbage disposal system beneath the Punk Hazard research facility. Luffy falls into this area after breaking through the floor during his battle with Monet.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Falls into Garbage Room
keyEvents.description: After using Jet Spear to break free from Monet's attack, Luffy creates a hole in the floor and falls into the garbage disposal area.
keyEvents.significance: Separates Luffy from the main conflict and creates a new challenge for him to overcome.

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's main research facility on Punk Hazard where he conducts experiments on children and develops weapons.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Monet Battle
keyEvents.description: Monet battles Luffy in the laboratory, using her snow powers to trap and freeze him.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location showcasing the facility's role as Caesar's base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Struggles with Children
keyEvents.description: Chopper attempts to restrain the drug-affected children in his Monster Point form.
keyEvents.significance: Highlights the tragic experiments conducted in the facility.

keyEvents.title: Mocha Protects the Candy
keyEvents.description: Mocha runs through the laboratory trying to keep the addictive candy away from the other children.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the desperation of the children's situation within the facility.
